content.rendered:
Directed by Shlok Sharma.

Written by Shlok Sharma.

Cast Nawazuddin Siddiqui(Shyam Tekchand). Shweta Tripathi(Sandhya). Trimala Adhikari(Sunita). Mohammad Samad(Mintu (as Mohd Samad)). Irfan Khan(Kamal). Harish Khanna(Raghuvir / Sandhya’s Father). Shreya Shah(Neelu). Haneef Gabbar(Shaktiman). Jhanvi Trivedi(Archana). Nandini Khatri(Bindya). Puja Banerji(Gynecologist). Saiba(Bansi Kaka). Swety Trivedi(Kamal’s Mother). Vasan Bala(Hospital Doctor). Dewanji(Principal). Abhinay Raj Singh(Syam Student (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers S.M. Ferozeuddin Alameer. Siddhanta Ashdhir. Apoorva Bakshi. Gaurav Dhingra. Guneet Dogra. Rahul Jadhav. Achin Jain. Deep Singh Kakkad. Yugshrestha Karpatne. Anurag Kashyap. Guneet Monga. Varun Ralliaram. Arun Rangachari. Vivek Rangachari. Mozez Singh. Piyush Abhay Singh. Vishakha Singh.

Production Khussro Films. Sikhya Entertainment.
